content: **size ** baby toddler child medium adult large adult to fit head circumference of approx 15½ -17½ 16½ -18½ 18-20 20-22 22-24 inches 39 5 - 43 42 47 45 5 51 51 56 56 61 cm **yarn ** plassard 100% alpaga des andes 100% alpaca 180 m 196 yards per 50 g ball you will need 5 different colors 1 skein each a good subtitution yarn would be drops alpaca 100% alpaca 180 m 196 yards per 50 g ball uses us crochet terminology
